entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 30 March 2023
